context.title: Changelog for Rule: `audio` element content has transcript

audio elements have a transcript (#500)","date":"1557244426"},{"commit":"604b1722e9350c21c1e16035629304791a28b600","msg":"rule: SC 1.2.3 & 1.2.5 Video alternatives (#204)","date":"1548148952"},{"commit":"e71f9fbbf9de177da8f99179bcc76402c2188abf","msg":"1.2.1 audio only and video only  (#276)","date":"1547037237"},{"commit":"2e9f83c287890d88f1e8098c8ca7a434afe58ef7","msg":"Fixing invalid HTML in SC1.2.2 and SC1.2.8 (#367)","date":"1544633771"},{"commit":"a87d096bedd05e62fb98dcf45f9de55bd66c674d","msg":"Remove \"focusable\" and \"is visible\" from Applicability in several rules due to consistency concerns (#310)","date":"1542618730"},{"commit":"968c78ec310b3e8d9cdebe95abf6feb6933fe7fc","msg":"\"Included in accessibility tree\" instead of \"exposed to assistive technologies\" (#269)","date":"1539346511"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"f2465b45d8ef15526595d98f9428bd41e58e90cb","msg":"SC1.2.1-Audio-captions (#159)","date":"1533735085"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"2eb176","name":"`audio` element content has transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `audio` elements must have a text alternative for all included auditory information.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
